Pull names of a photo based on a string in the file name

Source: R/photo.R
fpr_photo_pull_by_str.Rd

Pull names of a photo based on a string in the file name

Usage

fpr_photo_pull_by_str(
  site = my_site,
  dir_photos = "data/photos/",
  str_to_pull = "barrel"
)

Arguments

site

Numeric indicating site id cooresponding to name of directory containing the images

dir_photos

String quoted for directory where photo directories are kept. Trailing forward slash required. Defaults to 'data/photos/'.

str_to_pull

String (quoted) value to search for in name of photo. must be unique in the file. Defaults to barrel

Value

String representing the full path filename of photo that matches

On this page

Developed by Allan Irvine.
